Hi. I'm Tomas Matejka aka Matka. I'm software developer by work and artist by passion :). And this is my site.

    Things I love:

    • Linux - embedded, on server, desktop
    • C, C++ - for Linux, or barebone for STM32 for ex.
    • JAVA - yea, it have its usages, I do mainly FX GUI apps in it :)
    • javascript, node.js - cool hypster functitonal things
    • STM32 - nice HW platform with full support
    • ARM - Toradex, Ronetix, with Linux or barebone
    • Communication technologies
    • Blender - open source 3D tool

    Current ongoing projects:

    • StreamDeck clone based on STM32
    • Build system for radio production company
    • Kozlik a Matka Productions

    Kozlik a Matka Productions is 3D/video entertainment production group, focused on bringing new technologies to custom interactions. We create games, help streamers create more engaging content, and more.

    We are currently supporting one streamer - HATRIK - go check him out and stay tuned for more things to come...
